name: Legitimate Application Dropped Archive
description: Detects programs on a Windows system that should not write an archive to disk
query: (process.executable:(/.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Pp][Nn][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ss][Aa][Cc][Cc][Ee][Ss][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ss][Pp][Uu][Bb]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Qq][Nn][Ee][Dd][Tt]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Vv][Ii][Ss][Ii][Oo]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd][Pp][Aa][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd][Vv][Ii][Ee][Ww]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Cc][Ee][Rr][Tt][Uu][Tt][Ii][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Cc][Ee][Rr][Tt][Oo][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Cc][Ee][Rr][Tt][Rr][Ee][Qq]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Dd][Ee][Ss][Kk][Tt][Oo][Pp][Ii][Mm][Gg][Dd][Oo][Ww][Nn][Ll][Dd][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Ss][Ee][Nn][Tt][Uu][Tt][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ff][Ii][Nn][Gg][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Nn][Oo][Tt][Ee][Pp][Aa][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Cc][Rr][Oo][Rr][Dd]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Rr][Dd][Rr][Cc][Ee][Ff]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Aa]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Hh][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND file.path:(/.*\.[Zz][Ii][Pp]/ OR /.*\.[Rr][Aa][Rr]/ OR /.*\.7[Zz]/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Ii][Aa][Gg][Cc][Aa][Bb]/ OR /.*\.[Aa][Pp][Pp][Xx]/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:(*\\winword.exe OR *\\excel.exe OR *\\powerpnt.exe OR *\\msaccess.exe OR *\\mspub.exe OR *\\eqnedt32.exe OR *\\visio.exe OR *\\wordpad.exe OR *\\wordview.exe OR *\\certutil.exe OR *\\certoc.exe OR *\\CertReq.exe OR *\\Desktopimgdownldr.exe OR *\\esentutl.exe OR *\\finger.exe OR *\\notepad.exe OR *\\AcroRd32.exe OR *\\RdrCEF.exe OR *\\mshta.exe OR *\\hh.exe) AND file.path:(*.zip OR *.rar OR *.7z OR *.diagcab OR *.appx))`
